verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6213>"Make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> them of beaten <S%H4749>work.<s%> You shall <S%H1961>use<s%> them for the <S%H4744>calling<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and for the <S%H4550>journeying<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps.<s%>
When they <S%H8628>blow<s%> <S%H2004>them,<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H3259>gather<s%> themselves to you at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>
If they <S%H8628>blow<s%> just <S%H259>one,<s%> then the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall gather themselves to <S%H3259>you.<s%>
When you <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm,<s%> the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the east <S%H6924>side<s%> shall go <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

When you <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the south <S%H8486>side<s%> shall go <S%H5265>forward.<s%> They shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> for their <S%H5265>journeys.<s%>
But when the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> is to be gathered <S%H6950>together,<s%> you shall <S%H8628>blow,<s%> but you shall not sound an <S%H7321>alarm.<s%>

"The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%> This shall be to you for a <S%H2708>statute<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

When you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6862>against<s%> the adversary who <S%H6887>oppresses<s%> <S%H7321>you,<s%> then you shall sound an alarm with the <S%H2689>trumpets.<s%> Then you will be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you will be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

"Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> and in your set <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> and in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months,<s%> you shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> over your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and over the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and they shall be to you for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"

It happened in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H6051>month,<s%> that the cloud was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> from over the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai;<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>stayed<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>
They <S%H7223>first<s%> went <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

<S%H7223>First,<s%> the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> forward according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of Amminadab was over his <S%H5992>army.<s%>
<S%H5417>Nethanel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar.<s%>
<S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>

The <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was taken <S%H3381>down;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari,<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> went <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

The <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> went <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur<s%> was over his <S%H6635>army.<s%>
<S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon.<s%>
<S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad.<s%>
The <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> set <S%H5265>forward,<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%> The others set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> before they <S%H935>arrived.<s%>

The <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%> was over his <S%H6635>army.<s%>
<S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>
<S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

The <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> which was the rear <S%H622>guard<s%> of all the <S%H4264>camps,<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai<s%> was over his <S%H6635>army.<s%>
<S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ochran<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher.<s%>
<S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan<s%> was over the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali.<s%>
Thus <S%H428>were<s%> the <S%H4550>travels<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies;<s%> and they went <S%H5265>forward.<s%>

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2246>Hobab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> the <S%H4084>Midianite,<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H2859>father-in<s%>-law, "We are <S%H5265>journeying<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give it to <S%H3212>you.<s%>' Come with <S%H2895>us,<s%> and we will treat you well; for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2895>good<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "I will not go; but I will <S%H3212>depart<s%> to my own <S%H776>land,<s%> and to my <S%H4138>relatives.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5800>"Don't<s%> leave <S%H3651>us,<s%> please; because you know how we are to <S%H2583>encamp<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and you can be our <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
It shall <S%H3212>be,<s%> if you go with <S%H2896>us,<s%> yes, it shall be, that whatever good <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3190>does<s%> to <S%H3190>us,<s%> we will do the same to you."

They set <S%H5265>forward<s%> from the <S%H2022>Mount<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey.<s%> The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' <S%H1870>journey,<s%> to seek <S%H8446>out<s%> a resting place for <S%H4496>them.<s%>
The <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was over them by <S%H3119>day,<s%> when they set <S%H5265>forward<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

It <S%H727>happened,<s%> when the ark went <S%H5265>forward,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and let your <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered!<s%> Let those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> you <S%H5127>flee<s%> before <S%H6440>you!<s%>"
When it <S%H5117>rested,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to the <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> of the thousands of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
